title: The Eye of Lies
description: A small town in Georgia holds the secrets to a girlâ€™s nightmare. Journey Navers, abused by parents who should have protected her, learned the chilling secrets, releasing a young spirit that haunted her waking days. For her, the gruesome nightmares came nightly. Determined to move forward in life and overcome the abuse, she runs away, all the while missing her brother, presumed dead. When she returns to her hometown years later, she discovers a body hidden within the wall of the house she grew up in, and the return of her lost brother. When a therapist ask her if her nightmare is a memory, Journey has to wonder, could it be a memory of something so terrible from her past, a childhood she has no memory of.
author: T. Wharton Johnson
